languages.text: "Чернь понимает лишь язык насилия, Лорд-капитан. При дальнейшей демонстрации неготовности сотрудничать по уставу положено сокращать подачу кислорода и перекрывать воду, что почти гарантированно восстановит порядок. Простолюдины могут жаловаться сколько угодно, но они сами источник своих страданий — им достаточно лишь склонить головы и оказывать содействие, чтобы в карательных мерах пропала надобность".

"The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."
languages.original_text: "Чернь понимает лишь язык насилия, Лорд-капитан. При дальнейшей демонстрации неготовности сотрудничать по уставу положено сокращать подачу кислорода и перекрывать воду, что почти гарантированно восстановит порядок. languages.text: "Der Abschaum versteht nur eine Sprache, Lord Captain: die Sprache der Gewalt. Sollten die Arbeiter auch weiterhin nicht kooperieren, wäre der nächste Schritt gemäß unserer Statuten die Drosselung der Luftversorgung und die Abschaltung des Wassers. Das stellt die Ordnung mit großer Sicherheit wieder her. Die Bauern können murren so viel sie wollen, letztlich sind sie selbst für ihre Lage verantwortlich ... sie müssen nur die Köpfe senken und sich fügen, dann brauchen wir keine Strafmaßnahmen mehr."
languages.original_text: "The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."

Sollten die Arbeiter auch weiterhin nicht kooperieren, wäre der nächste Schritt gemäß unserer Statuten die Drosselung der Luftversorgung und die Abschaltung des Wassers. Das stellt die Ordnung mit großer Sicherheit wieder her. Die Bauern können murren so viel sie wollen, letztlich sind sie selbst für ihre Lage verantwortlich ... sie müssen nur die Köpfe senken und sich fügen, dann brauchen wir keine Strafmaßnahmen mehr."

languages.text: « La populace ne parle qu'un seul langage, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, celui de la violence. Conformément à la réglementation en vigueur, si les ouvriers persistent dans leur refus de coopérer, leur alimentation en oxygène sera restreinte et ils seront privés d'eau, ce qui ne manquera pas de rétablir l'ordre rapidement. Les paysans peuvent se plaindre tout leur soûl, mais en fin de compte, ils sont seuls responsables de leurs malheurs. Il leur suffit de courber l'échine et de rentrer dans le rang pour éviter des mesures disciplinaires. »
languages.original_text: "The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."

Il leur suffit de courber l'échine et de rentrer dans le rang pour éviter des mesures disciplinaires. »

languages.text: «Esta gentuza solo entiende un idioma, Lord Capitán: la violencia. Conforme dicta la normativa, si persisten en esta falta de cooperación, el siguiente paso es limitar el aire y cortar el agua, lo que casi siempre resuelve el problema. Que la plebe proteste cuanto quiera, pero al final son ellos la causa de sus propios problemas. Solo tienen que agachar la cabeza y someterse y dejarán de ser necesarias estas medidas punitivas».
languages.original_text: "The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."

traits.locale_text: «Esta gentuza solo entiende un idioma, Lord Capitán: la violencia. Conforme dicta la normativa, si persisten en esta falta de cooperación, el siguiente paso es limitar el aire y cortar el agua, lo que casi siempre resuelve el problema. Que la plebe proteste cuanto quiera, pero al final son ellos la causa de sus propios problemas. Solo tienen que agachar la cabeza y someterse y dejarán de ser necesarias estas medidas punitivas».

languages.text: 「暴徒に理解できる言語はただ一つ、暴力なのです、ロード・キャプテン。規則に則れば、労働者たちが協力する意欲を見せないのであれば、次の段階は空気の供給制限および断水が行われます。これでほぼ確実に秩序が回復します。農民たちが不平を言うのは勝手ですが、結局のところ、自分たちの不幸の原因は自分たちなのです。ただ首を垂れて一列に並べばいい。そうすれば懲罰的措置の必要性はなくなるのです」
languages.original_text: "The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."

traits.locale_text: 「暴徒に理解できる言語はただ一つ、暴力なのです、ロード・キャプテン。規則に則れば、労働者たちが協力する意欲を見せないのであれば、次の段階は空気の供給制限および断水が行われます。これでほぼ確実に秩序が回復します。農民たちが不平を言うのは勝手ですが、結局のところ、自分たちの不幸の原因は自分たちなのです。ただ首を垂れて一列に並べばいい。そうすれば懲罰的措置の必要性はなくなるのです」

languages.text: “乌合之众只懂得一种语言，那就是暴力的语言，舰长大人。根据规定，如果工人们继续反抗，下一步就是限制空气供应，切断水源，只要这样，秩序很快就会恢复。随便那些农奴怎么抱怨都好，说到底，这一切都是他们自找的。只要他们能老老实实服从命令，我们就根本没有必要惩罚他们。”
languages.original_text: "The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."

traits.locale_text: “乌合之众只懂得一种语言，那就是暴力的语言，舰长大人。根据规定，如果工人们继续反抗，下一步就是限制空气供应，切断水源，只要这样，秩序很快就会恢复。随便那些农奴怎么抱怨都好，说到底，这一切都是他们自找的。只要他们能老老实实服从命令，我们就根本没有必要惩罚他们。”

languages.text: "Ayaktakımı, yalnızca tek bir dilden anlar Lord Kaptan. Bu da şiddetin dilidir. Mevzuat gereği işçiler iş birliğine yanaşmamakta diretirlerse atılacak bir sonraki adım, hava teminini sınırlandırıp su kaynağını kesmek olur. Bu da düzeni çok yüksek ihtimalle yeniden sağlar. Köylüler istedikleri kadar homurdanıp dursunlar. En nihayetinde kendi sefaletlerinden kendileri sorumlu. Tek yapmaları gereken, kafalarını eğip kurallara uymak. Ardından cezalandırıcı tedbir gereksinimi ortadan kalkar."
languages.original_text: "The rabble understands only one language, Lord Captain: that of violence. As per regulations, should the labourers persist in their unwillingness to cooperate, the next step is limiting air supply and cutting off water, which is almost certain to restore order. The peasants can grumble all they want, but in the end, they are the source of their own misery — all they have to do is bow their heads and fall in line, and the need for punitive measures will disappear."
